title: 12. Lal engkimtitheia chuan chatuanin ro a rel dawn
lyrics:
Doh is C
Lal engkimtitheia chuan, chatuanin ro a rel dawn,
A ropuina leh thuneihnate chu chatuanin a zual zel ang.

Aw, lo kal ula, nangni, hnam tin renga mite u,
Lalpa kan Pathian hmaah kan zain i kun ang u, i kun ang u;
A ni, ama hnenah chauh, kan engkimte hlan vekin,
Khawvel thilte kalsanin, kan Lalpa rawng chauh i bawl ang u.

Keini suala thi tawh hnu, chatuan nunna min pe leh,
Pathian thisenin min rawn tlan leh a, van ropuina chang turin.

Chhandamna mak tak mai hi, hnam tin, chitin tan a ni,
Tu pawh a duh apiangin chhandamna chu a thlawnin an nei thei.
